text: The 1949–50 Macedonian Republic League was the 6th since its establishment. Rabotnik Bitola won their first championship title. == Participating teams == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Club ! City |- | Bregalnica | Shtip |- | Crvena Dzvezda | Veles |- | Kozhuf | Gevgelija |- | Ohrid | Ohrid |- | Pitu Guli | Krushevo |- | Pobeda | Prilep |- | Rabotnik | Bitola |- | Shar | Tetovo |- | Sloga | Skopje |- | Student | Skopje |- | Tekstilec | Skopje |- | Tikvesh | Kavadarci |} ==Final table== ==References== Karovski, Ilija (1996) FK Tikvesh 1930–1995 p. 32, 33, 34 ==External links== *SportSport.ba *Football Federation of Macedonia Category:Macedonian Football League seasons Yugo 3
title: 1949–50 Macedonian Republic League
